experience: You and Linda both know Lukas Grabiec, Jaime Casap, and 65 others
My company got acquired and look where that got me!

Responsible for Talent Acquisition for multiple Product Groups.  Sourcing the best technical talent to join our already amazing group of software developers that create kick-ass products for our customers.   Nearly as old as the Internet itself, GoDaddy was born to give people an easy, affordable way to get their ideas online. Today, we have more than 12 million customers around the world, but our goal is much the same. We’re here to help people easily start, confidently grow and successfully run their own ventures. In short, to help them kick ass, online and off!
Responsible for staffing up Google's Tempe location with software developers and launched their internship/new grad program for Arizona.   Responsible for staffing up their European Data centers
recommendations: Mary Vu
Associate Director of Sales
July 20, 2011, Linda was a client of Mary’s

I was the Convention Director for SETIcon which was an astrobiology conference.  From the first phone call to inquire about the hotel to the last day of the conference, I was very impressed with her professionalism and follow-through.  She understood from the beginning what I needed and offered great suggestions and ideas.   I have worked with many hotels and staff over the years and working with Mary and the Hyatt was one of the best experiences I had. We received several great comments after the event from our attendees and guest speakers about the hotel and the staff.  Mary stepped up and went above and beyond to ensure everything went smooth for SETIcon.  She was a delight to work with.

I am a Lightspeed customer and I always contacted Ian when I wanted to make a new purchase.  Since these were high end purchases, I wanted to esnure I was getting a good value on the art work purchased.   He was very knowledgable about the different pieces of art and was very meticulous in answering all my questions. Ian would also make recommedations based on my description of what I was looking for.   I am happy with all the purchases I made.  I appreciated Ian's follow-up, his customer service and his passion for ensuring that as a customer, I purchased items that I would be satisfied with.

Jess Houda
Senior Recruiter
November 12, 2009, Jess worked with Linda in the same group

Jessica was very proficient at managing complex recruitment issues.  She often times would have a candidate that would need to interview with several folks located in different countries and time zones on the same day. Jessica would manage the process, work closely with the candidate and ensure all the interviews occured without any problems. She has great follow-up skills and is very detail oriented.  She enjoys a challenge and is always willing to help her fellow co-workers.

Endorsed by 17 of Linda’s colleagues at GoDaddy
summary: I am passionate about finding the right candidate for the right job. There is nothing more rewarding then seeing someone you hire thrive and grow in their career and reach their full potential.  I enjoy college recruiting and providing students the opportunity to start their journey towards an amazing career.   When I am not hard at work finding the perfect candidate, I get to sit in the Captains Chair on the set of Star Trek Continues. Or....I get to hang out with Chekov, yes Walter Koenig on the set of Star Trek Renegades. I am currently part of two separate Independent Star Trek Projects and enjoy spending time with Klingons, Vulcans, Andorians and even humans.   These are produced with an army of volunteers, crowd funded supporters and lots of Star Trek love.    If you haven't checked them out, below are the links to the YouTube page.  Engage! https://www.youtube.com/user/StarTrekContinueshttps://www.youtube.com/user/StarTrekRenegades
name: Linda Zaruches
